title: Pfeffer Chica c o fro sale

posts.post_title: Pfeffer Chica c o fro sale
posts.post_content:
BVG 1.5. $450.00 delivered. Recently discovered caption variation. Check or money order only. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations, requests for information, etc. Correspondence by email at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please visit my updated website. Thank you for looking.

[IMG]https://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t206pfe-c1.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/pferrer%20capt.jpg[/IMG]
Please let me know if you can view it. [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] Thanks to everyone for their patience.

Ed, I sent you an email today about the Willet PSA 5 you have.  Will take it if still available.

Thanks,

Bob
